channel.title: Puzzles on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Puzzles on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The Wild, Citywide Scavenger Hunt That Ate San Francisco
item.description: Twelve quests; 12,000 players. This is Pursuit, a real-world race to find clues scattered across the city, solve mysteries, and maybe make a few friends.
